titleStmt.title: A plea for moderation towards dissenters occasioned by the grand-juries presenting the Sermon against persecution at the last assizes holden at Sherburn in Dorset-shire : to which is added An answer to the objections commonly made aganst that sermon / by Samuel Bolde ...
titleStmt.author: Bold, S. (Samuel), 1649-1737.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
